pages.text: Stella looked up at the night sky, dreaming of adventures among the stars.
She built a shiny spaceship from scraps she found in her backyard.
With a whoosh, Stella blasted off, waving goodbye to her cat, Luna.
She zoomed past planets and dodged sparkling comets.
On a distant moon, Stella made a new friend: a giggling alien named Zorp.
Together, they explored, laughed, and promised to meet again among the stars.

stories.title: Leo the Lion Learns About Strength

pages.text: Leo was a little lion who wanted to be strong like his dad.
He tried to roar loudly, but his roar was soft and squeaky.
Leo watched his friends lift big rocks, but he could only move pebbles.
One day, Leo saw a tiny bird stuck in a bush. He gently helped her out.
The bird chirped, 'Thank you, Leo! You are strong and kind.'
Leo smiled. He learned that being strong means helping others, too!
